data.message:
Yo bro when are you going to cone back to New York n NJ ... For your fans... That shit at Metlife wasn't your best.... We saw you,in 02 n 03 at Montague Mountain, PA n it was great u were so into it all n feel in your fans.  This one at MetLife was not your best could barely see you with Pit Tix ... N then u were u
Just out. What happened it be great to give back to the fans that been there for you since day 1!  God Bless Em
